item.title: Dead Person Switches - appeal for journalists
item.description: I am hoping to interview some investigative journalists for my masters thesis at the University of Oxford.

item.title: Making the best possible referrals
item.description: The Data Standards Authority are holding an open challenge to discover and set a new data standard for vulnerable people services.
